title: Bitpanda Pro Rebrands, Raises $33M in Peter Thiel-Led Round
description: Thiel’s Valar Ventures led the fundraise for One Trading, which is now fully separated from Bitpanda.

title: GBTC charges forward, 33% discount marks narrowest gap in over a year
description:
Quick Take The Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) discount to NAV continues its contraction, currently standing at -33%. This represents the narrowest it has been for over a year, reflecting a potentially encouraging trend. GBTC has shown notable strength, rising 137% year-to-date. Notably, it has surged 50% since June 16th, a significant uptick coinciding with the […]

title: Stellar spikes 12% to hit 70-day high, outperforming top 100 coins
description:

title: Bitcoin Preparing for the Next Big Move to $40,000 as $3.9T Asset Manager Files for Bitcoin ETF Approval
description: Bitcoin price recently rallied towards $31k fueled by institutional investors’ demand after BlackRock with $10T filed for a BTC EFT with U.S. SEC.
